title: S-/S/S+ rankings for mastery 7
body:
Im really confused. Its do with with getting a S on rengar.
Last time I played rengar when I sorta gave up getting Mastery 7 was when I went 25/3 got 4 drags and a baron with 170 minions at 35 mins as jg. That was only a S-.
My friend tonight played rengar and went 10/3 with 1 out of 2 drags and 120 minions at 25 minutes. He got a S.
Why did he get a S and I only get a S- regardless of doing better in every aspect of the game.

Edit: You guys are asking for assists, I was 25/3/6 he was 10/3/7

replies.body: What are you guys talking about, wards dont impact the score at all, my friend got multiple S+ on support without buying a single ward (he is new to the game), only things that have impact are CS, KDA, kill participation (really important), barons/drakes and general stats for other players who played same champ in same position.
You know this is just a QQ thread when OP omits the number of assists that the Rengar has had.
Wards and CS, did your friend have more assist then you?

Wards and CS are really heavy on S score (and i think that farming should be less important because you can't steal others farm to get and S). i got an A on Aurelion Sol with 20/7/8 score with 184 cs at 41 mins and I also warded not a lot but constantly.
Probably ward count was low or the algorithm thinks that 10/3 in 25 is better than 25/3 in 35?  idk just suggesting.  We don't know their algorithm for champion mastery.
